heading: HB07728
0: AN ACT SEPARATING THE DUMANJUG NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL (BITOON NATIONAL VOCATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL - POBLACION EXTENSION) IN BARANGAY LIONG, MUNICIPALITY OF DUMANJUG, PROVINCE OF CEBU FROM THE BITOON NATIONAL VOCATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL, CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS DUMANJUG NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR

FULL TITLE : AN ACT SEPARATING THE DUMANJUG NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL (BITOON NATIONAL VOCATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL - POBLACION EXTENSION) IN BARANGAY LIONG, MUNICIPALITY OF DUMANJUG, PROVINCE OF CEBU FROM THE BITOON NATIONAL VOCATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL, CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS DUMANJUG NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
